title: The Yolo Bots
body:
Been super busy over the last few weeks, so only been playing bots to get my FWOD. But what's going on with bot games atm
Sure getting boosting bots happen sometimes 1 maybe 2, but surely not 4 after 4 after 4 =/ maybe im just unlucky. Ok fine 4 bots thats fine i can deal with that, but when you get the real AI bots tower diving on you (ryze is a boss for this) cant do anything so its loss time. 

So tell me reporting boosters clearly does nuffin all im doing is wasting 40-50 mins of my time or having to quit and face a timeout for leaving to meny games. 

Otherwise carry on fun times and all that

replies.body:
>So tell me reporting boosters clearly does nuffin all im doing is wasting 40-50 mins of my time or having to quit and face a timeout for leaving to meny games.

They do get banned, however the bans will not go out immediately as 3rd party bans go out in waves. 3rd party bans are always investigated to double check that the permaban could be deserving, after all, quite a few new players do play like bots. 

The problem is, that even after all these bot accounts are banned, heaps more pop up to take their place because the market for level 30 accounts still exists. It's a vicious cycle that Riot are attempting to stop or at least slow down, however due to the supply/demand nature, it looks like it wont go away completely :c

haha yeah though it depends on what champion you play. If you play yasou or some big hyper carry it's not actually that hard to carry the 4 feeder scripts against the 5 intermediate bots. However if you play Janna, you'll need to be playing at around platinum level to win or build nonstandard carry items like atk speed ap carry janna with nashors. I feel it's a good training method but it really shouldn't be happening.
